welcome_message_body: Welcome to Formosa, Argentina! Enjoy the city's charming blend of colonial architecture, vibrant culture, and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Formosa has to offer.

restaurants.name: Vandus Bar

restaurants.address: Rua visconde de porto seguro, Formosa, GO

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Pucu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Pucu Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
